activities: Atlantic.Net operates a data center that provides infrastructure as a service for a variety of customers with with offices around the  globe.  Our data center has been certified in compliance with  a SSAE 16 Type ll audit.   We do not have access to the information stored in our facility.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Our Customer's data is collocated at our data center
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
